context.p: Cropping your screenshots will make it easier to focus on important information in the screenshot. Cropping can also hide parts of your screen that you want to keep private.

step.cmd: Click and hold a canvas handle.

fig.title: There are eight canvas handles (circled in red) you can drag to crop the image.

step.cmd: Drag the handle in the direction you want to crop.
Release the handle to stop cropping.
Repeat steps 4-6 until satisfied with the cropped image.

taskbody.result: You now have a cropped screenshot.
